channel.title: Teleports, Dodian Base Version 7. Changing Cords
channel.description:
Hello guys, Currently I am working on a project, unknown to many people. Well first up it is Dodian Version 7 Base. I decided to add Dragons, More Mini Games, etc. To my surprise I couldn't find a trace of Cordinates which would lead me to change them for the new location. (The cords for teleports. Places I have looked: ~Client.Java ~TextHandler.Java ~MagicHandler.Java, and CFG if memory serves me right.
Well at the moment I am puzzled by this. If you have any idea about this, feel free to post. Also I do not want flame started on this thread. I ask kindly you do not do so, applys for spam as well. Thanks for reading this out, you maybe or may not know. Please realize I have added more then this, it is up untill now I decided to make the old teleports go to the new destination.

item.title: Teleports, Dodian Base Version 7. Changing Cords
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

To find the teleport’s for the Varrock teleport go into your clickingMost.java, and search,

case 4140:

You should see,

case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(2999+misc.random(3), 3377+misc.random(3), 0); break;

Packet 50235 is the ID for the interface when you click on the Varrock teleport in-game. Simply edit the coordinate’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Teleports, Dodian Base Version 7. Changing Cords

item.title: Teleports, Dodian Base Version 7. Changing Cords
item.dc:creator: @ion5005 ion5005
item.description:
@ion5005 wrote:

Okay man I’ll check it out and get back to you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2008, 09:19:10 pm[/size][hr]Nope. This did not work. I am dumbfounded…

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports, Dodian Base Version 7. Changing Cords
item.dc:creator: @wezzyfbaby wezzyfbaby
item.description:
@wezzyfbaby wrote:

Look for :
case 50235:
triggerTel
it should be around there
and tele there with ::tele to make suure it’s right for you.

Read full topic
